meanings.definition: To move rhythmically to music, typically following a set sequence of steps.
meanings.sent1: She danced gracefully at the ballet recital.
meanings.sent2: The children danced happily at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat danced around the room chasing a laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The leaves danced in the wind as the storm approached.
meanings.sent5: His heart danced with joy when he saw her smile.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she danced all night at the concert.
meanings.sent2: They danced together at the wedding last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The memories of the fun they had danced in her mind.
meanings.sent4: The flames danced in the fireplace, casting a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The colors on the canvas danced in perfect harmony.
